Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.surround.parser.Token

  • Packages that use Token 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.surround.parser
    This package contains the QueryParser.jj source file for the Surround parser.

    • Uses of Token in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.surround.parser

      Fields in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.surround.parser declared as Token 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Token ParseException.currentToken
      This is the last token that has been consumed successfully.
      Token QueryParser.jj_nt
      Next token.
      Token Token.next
      A reference to the next regular (non-special) token from the input stream.
      Token Token.specialToken
      This field is used to access special tokens that occur prior to this token, but after the immediately preceding regular (non-special) token.
      Token QueryParser.token
      Current token.
